# GitHub Actions Skills

Skills for creating and managing GitHub Actions workflows.

## Available Skills

| Skill | Description |
|-------|-------------|
| `github-actions:create-workflow` | Create a new workflow from patterns |
| `github-actions:debug-workflow` | Debug a failing workflow |
| `github-actions:optimize` | Optimize workflow performance |

## Usage

```bash
# Create a CI workflow
doyaken skill github-actions:create-workflow --type=ci

# Debug a failing workflow
doyaken skill github-actions:debug-workflow --run=12345

# Optimize workflows
doyaken skill github-actions:optimize
```
